client module

class client.client(host)

Bases: object

This is a client class , it represents the client side of our code, it has a constructor Client(host).It has eight parameters and twelve member functions
Parameters

  • credentials (tuple) – login details of the client

  • privateKeysFound (bool) – to keep track of privateKeys

  • var (bool) – Checks whether the client is present or not

  • clientsocket (socket) – connects to the server

  • clientSuperSocket (socket) – connects to the SuperServer

  • address (string) – address of the server to which the client is connected to

  • sendThread (thread) – Thread for sending messages

  • recvThread (thread) – Thread for receiving messages

__init__(host)

Constructor method, initializes everything

Parameters

host (string) – address of the host

auth()

It is used for authentication of client when we enter its login/SignUp

Returns

returns username and password of the client while signing up

Return type

tuple

decrypt_images(imagedata)

Decrypts the message given the encrypted image

Parameters

imagedata (bytes) – encrypted image

Returns

decrypted image

Return type

bytes

decrypt_message(ciphertext)

Decrypts the message given the encoded message

Parameters

ciphertext (string) – encrypted message

Returns

decrypted message

Return type

string

download_unsavedimages(username)

Downloads the images which client received while he was offline

Parameters

username (string) – username of the client

encrypt_images(imagedata, key)

encrypts the imagebytes given a key

Parameters

  • imagedata (bytes) – imagedata to be encrypted

  • key (bytes) – key which is used to encrypt the message

Returns

encrypted image

Return type

bytes

encrypt_message(message, key)

encrypts the message given a key

Parameters

  • message (string) – message to be encrypted

  • key (bytes) – key which is used to encrypt the message

Returns

encrypted message

Return type

string

encrypt_password(password)

Encryption of password

Parameters

password (string) – password to be encrypted

Returns

hashed value of password

Return type

tuple

generateKeys(username)

generate oublic and private keys for the user using rsa

Parameters

username (string) – denotes the username of the user

generate_privatekeyfile(dict)

generated a .pem file containing private keys

Parameters

dict (dictionary) – dictionary containing private keys

isSame(password, stored, salt)

Checks if th salted password is same as the stored password

Parameters

  • password (bytes) – string having password

  • salt – string having salt

  • stored (string) – stored password

print_all_msgs(username)

Print all the messages which client received while he was offline

Parameters

username (string) – username of the client

recv()

For receiving the messages from other clients either in the form of DM’s or groupchats

send()

Used for sending messages from one client to other client or client to its group

update()

When client wants to leave this function is called, its job is to disconnect the client from its presently connected server

client.is_json(myjson)

Checks if a particular object is a valid json string

Parameters

myjson (string,byte) – parameter to check
